abstract: The Seattle-based online retailer unveiled a new payment service that it will offer other online retailers to use on their Web sites.
snippet: The Seattle-based online retailer unveiled a new payment service that it will offer other online retailers to use on their Web sites.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Amazon wants its customers to take their wallets with them when they leave the giant Web store.

headline.main: Amazon Offers Other Sites Use of Its Payment Service
headline.print_headline: Amazon Offers Other Sites Use of Its Payment Service
